name: SafeTrek Node Bootstrap
description: A bootstrap project to quickly get you started with the SafeTrek API using NodeJS.

CLIENT_ID.description: The client id for your application provided to you by SafeTrek

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret for your application provided to you by SafeTrek

REDIRECT_URL.description: The URL you want to redirect to after retrieving your 'access_token' and 'refresh_token'. Leave blank if you're not sure or want to use the Demo redirect URL.
